features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新支持智慧识物-购物功能，新增分屏组合和相机水印可编辑功能，优化平行空间、通知栏显示效果，修复部分场景异常耗电问题，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
新增相机水印可编辑功能，可自行添加和还原水印，体验路径：图库>水印照片>编辑>水印图标。
新增以图标形式保存分屏组合，点击图标即可快捷打开已保存分屏组合应用。
优化防系统位置跟踪、防广告跟踪功能体验。
新增支持智慧识物-购物功能。
优化部分场景通知栏显示效果。
修复部分场景异常耗电问题。
合入安卓2024年7月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2024/7
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this recommended update introduces AI object recognition and AI shopping functions, as well as app combinations in split-screen mode. Watermarks can be edited. This release also optimizes Parallel Space and the display effect of notification panel. The issue of abnormal power consumption in some scenarios is fixed, and a security patch is incorporated.
Watermarks can now be added and removed as desired. You can experience it by going to: Gallery > Watermarked photos > Edit > Watermarks.
App combinations used in split-screen mode can be saved as icons, allowing quick access to the saved combinations.
The user experience of anti-tracking function for location and ads is optimized.
AI object recognition and AI shopping functions are introduced.
The display effect of notification panel is optimized in some scenarios.
Fixes the issue of abnormal power consumption in some scenarios.

Android Security Patch (July 2024) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2024/7

1. Installing this update will not erase your personal data, but a backup beforehand is still recommended. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3.
